Phone QR Code Generator

Create a QR code that opens the dialer app on any smartphone with your number ready to call. Perfect for support lines and business flyers.

Pro Tips:
  • Include the country code for international calls (e.g., +1 for USA)
  • Ensure the number is correctly formatted
  • Static codes work even if the user has no internet

Enter details on the left to generate your QR code

QR Code Information:

  • Size:512 x 512 px
  • Format:PNG / SVG
  • Security:Local Generation
  • Expiration:Never

How to Create your QR Code

Creating a professional QR code is fast and easy with our tool. Simply follow these steps:

  1. Enter your information: Use the form above to enter the URL, WiFi details, or text you want to encode.
  2. Customize: Select the size that best fits your needs.
  3. Generate: Click the generate button to create your custom QR code instantly.
  4. Download: Save your QR code as a high-quality PNG for digital use or a scalable SVG for printing.

Frequently Asked Questions

Will the phone call be made automatically?

No. For security reasons, scanning the code will open the phone's dialer app with the number filled in. The user must still press the "Call" button to start the call.

Does this work for international numbers?

Yes. We recommend using the international format (e.g., +1 for USA) to ensure the number can be dialed correctly from anywhere in the world.
